name: muiSmartHome
0:
”Alexa, ask mui board to set a 5 minute timer”
”Alexa, ask mui board to set an alarm for 10am”
”Alexa, ask mui board to show me the weather”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mui board
Developer Terms of Use
des: Connect Alexa to your mui board and easily control mui features at a distance. With your voice, control Moment Timers on the mui board. Have the freedom to seamlessly switch between voice and tactile control. Additionally, gain the added benefit of seeing information in an easy-to-digest format. No more guessing how much time is left on your timer. mui shows relevant visual information without being unnecessarily distracting.
